arts.ttl: Official: Surprise absence as Barcelona name squad to face Real Sociedad
arts.sum: La Liga champions Barcelona have on Sunday afternoon announced the club’s latest matchday squad. And it features one somewhat surprising absentee. Barcelona are of course primed to return to action…

arts.sum: FC Barcelona have the chance to go atop the La Liga table, as the current leaders, Real Madrid, dropped points last night in their 5-2 defeat to Atletico Madrid. arts.ttl: Lamine Yamal returns to full fitness in time for Sunday's clash with Real Sociedad
arts.sum: In a big update, Lamine Yamal has received the medical discharge, after recovering from his pubic discomfort, and is named in the squad for today’s match. The 18-year-old returns after missing the last four matches.
